Jam auto-captures technical logs, and creates developer-ready bug reports in seconds.


CAPTURE EVERYTHING DEVELOPERS NEED

👩🏽‍💻 Developer-Ready Bug Reports
Jam auto-captures console logs, network errors, user actions, and device info so developers can start resolving issues faster with full context of what happened.

📽️ Replay Issues Step by Step
Reproduce any bug or scenario. Replay every interaction to understand bugs in context and resolve them faster.

🔌 App Integrations That Work Where You Do
Connect with all your essential tools and automate workflows across Jira, GitHub, Linear, Notion, Slack and more.

🎧 Let Your Users Report Bugs via Your Helpdesk
Let users report bugs through Intercom, and other helpdesk tools. Turn user-submitted issues into developer-ready bug reports.

🕖 Save Time for Your Team
Stop wasting time on unclear bug reports, hours of context gathering and back-and-forth. With Jam, everything developers need is captured in seconds.

🪄 Empower Everyone to Contribute
